currentdescription:
1.Extensive, door to door garbage collection in segregated form from each house hold per day. 
2.Transportation of waste to the compost pit, Processing of wet waste at the pit and segregated dry waste to the sanitary landfill site on own carriage. 
3.Collection of User Charges.
4.Per day Cleaning & Sweeping of all gully, Road, Main road,
5.Periodic cleaning of all drainage (i.e small & Large) and maintain uninterrupted water flow.
6.Disposal of dead animals carcase.
7.Spraying of Chuna and Bleaching at regular intervals.
8.Garbage collection from dustbin installed by Municipal Council.
9.Periodic cleaning of Toilet, Urinal and Nagar Palika properties etc
10.Any other work assigned from time to time will also have to be done.
11.All above work for all 28 wards of Ballia Municipal Council.
